content:
Hi everyone! I'm a Rust convert, mostly self-taught programmer, doing C++ in my day job. I'd like to contribute more regularly to the Rust compiler and have recently claimed a new issue to fix.
I'm currently encountering some spurious build issues trying to set up my workspace for the project, but will ask for help, once I figured, which is the right place where to ask for it :smile:
Most likely a good place to ask would be #t-compiler/help, another good resource is https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/
Hi everyone, I'm old (well, middle age) C++ programmer, that fell in love with Rust!
